level.text: Each director shall have one vote for purposes of decisions made by the board of directors.
Unless the organic rules otherwise provide, the affirmative vote of a majority of directors present at a meeting shall be required for action by the board of directors.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
